body_html:
Oh,sorry for the vague description.
I have used torch.eig funtion to compute the eigenvalues and eigenvectors of a variable real square matrix. And there is a notice: "RuntimeError: the derivative for 'eig' is not implemented“ when I try to use backward funtion.
body_text:
Oh,sorry for the vague description.
I have used torch.eig funtion to compute the eigenvalues and eigenvectors of a variable real square matrix. And there is a notice: "RuntimeError: the derivative for 'eig' is not implemented“ when I try to use backward funtion.
body:
Oh,sorry for the vague description.
I have used **torch.eig** funtion to compute the eigenvalues and eigenvectors of a variable real square matrix. And there is a notice: "RuntimeError: the derivative for 'eig' is not implemented“ when I try to use backward funtion.
